name: ai-expense-tracker
description: AI-powered expense tracking application with predictive analytics and dual database architecture

scripts.preinstall: echo 'ðŸš€ Installing AI Expense Tracker dependencies...'
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing backend dependencies...' && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:frontend: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: echo 'ðŸ”§ Starting development environment...' && docker-compose up --build
scripts.prod: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting production environment...' && docker-compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml up -d --build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: echo 'ðŸ—ï¸ Backend build completed (no build step required for Flask)'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:docker && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:cache: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../backend && rm -rf __pycache__ .pytest_cache
scripts.deploy:aws: echo 'â˜ï¸ Deploying to AWS...' && chmod +x deploy.sh && ./deploy.sh production
scripts.health:check: curl -f http://localhost:5000/api/health || echo 'âŒ Backend health check failed'
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d mysql mongo
scripts.db:backup: echo 'ðŸ’¾ Creating database backup...' && mkdir -p backups && docker exec expense_mysql mysqldump -u expense_user -ppassword123 expense_tracker > backups/mysql_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.security:scan: echo 'ðŸ”’ Running security scan...' && cd frontend && npm audit && cd ../backend && pip-audit
scripts.docs:generate: echo 'ðŸ“š Generating documentation...' && cd backend && python -m pydoc -w .
scripts.performance:test: echo 'âš¡ Running performance tests...' && cd frontend && npm run build && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --output=html --output-path=./performance-report.html
